name: Kill Dream
description:
/!\This game is not suitable for children/!\

Hello there folks! I hope you all are safe :D The demo of Kill dream is out now, a game that I'm working on :)

Here is the synopsis of the game:

You will play Francis, a serial killer who has become a guinea pig for the Order to carry out a human experimentation.This experiment consists to kill people in their dream. The Order sends you into the dream of a former scientist who worked for them and who threatens them to reveal their secrets. In the game, you will have to clear a path, solve puzzles and fight the guardians in the target's dream.

If you enjoy the demo, please support me :3 and even if it's just by playing the game and sharing it, means a lot too!

And yes, I almost forgot, follow my itch.io account and my facebook page to get any regular updates for the full release of the game:

Ramose Tsimbina - Game developer | Facebook
